level.heading: Exemptions.
level.text: ยง 20-319 Exemptions. The following persons shall be exempt from the provisions of this subchapter: 1. Persons acting pursuant to an order or the process of a court of competent jurisdiction. 2. Sheriffs and marshals acting in accordance with their powers and duties as public officers. 3. Duly licensed auctioneers selling at auction.
